extension.name: Tweets Module
extension.author: Jeremy Wilken
extension.description: A simple twitter module for Joomla 1.6, lets you style how you it should be displayed.

field.name: user
field.label: Twitter Username
field.description: Put the user name of the Twitter user you wish to display.

field.name: quantity
field.label: Number of Tweets
field.description: Enter the number of tweets to display, limit is 20.

field.name: cachetime
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The length of time between refreshing the cache, be nice to Twitter.

field.name: date
field.label: Date Display
field.description: Select if the format should be # mins ago, or show the tweet date with optional formatting below.

field.name: agoorder
field.label: Position of word 'ago'
field.description: Formats the location of 'ago' or the proper translation, such as 'vor 5 minuten' in German rather than '5 minutes ago' in English.

field.name: linktype
field.label: Link Method
field.description: Allows you format the link to open in a blank window

field.name: format
field.label: Date Format
field.description: If you selected the date/time option above, then this is how the date should be formatted. Use PHP date formatting. http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.date.php

field.name: beforetext
field.label: Text before Tweets
field.description: Allows you to add anything to the module that will display above the tweets, can contain HTML

field.name: aftertext
field.label: Text after Tweets
field.description: Allows you to add anything to the module that will display below the tweets, can contain HTML
